runs.comm: swings in full, almost loses his balance while trying to come forward but manages to squeeze it towards third man
length delivery on the off stump line, defended to the off side
outswinger on the off stump line, pushed to mid-off

Porterfield is run out. It was driven down the track and Mills lunged to his right, got a hand on the ball which went on to hit the stumps at the other end. Porterfield had backed up too far. What a way to go.
moves down the leg side. Wide.
full pitched on the middle, driven to mid-on
length delivery outside off, holding its line, punched to backward point
low full toss outside off and driven to the left of mid-off where McCullum makes a valiant diving effort but couldn't reach it.
drags back the length to hit the good length and takes it away from Wilson who pushes his bat and is beaten
straightens on the leg stump line, tries to work it to the on side, misses and is struck on the pad
edged but falls short of first slip. It angled away from Wilson, opened him up, and got the edge
that took off from short of length, caught Wilson by surprise and hit him on his body. He was looking to pull but it jumped on him
dropped by Ian Butler at mid-on. Wilson pulled weakly to right of Butler who seemed to have it covered but ended up juggling it a few times and in the end spilled it.
length delivery around the off stump, defended to the off side
couple of steps down the track, tries to punch on the up and edges it to right of third man
short in length and moving away from Niall who flashes it down to third man

Flamboyant effort from McCullum at mid-off to take the catch. It was hit well to the left of him and he moved to his left and threw in a spectacular dive but couldn't hold on. It just brushed his finger tips.
Niall drags the short of length delivery straight to Oram at mid-on. He took couple of steps down the track and swung it but mistimed it straight to Oram
cutting away with bounce, tries to dab it to third man but is beaten by the extra bounce.
overpitched outside off stump and square driven powerfully past the diving cover point fielder
angled across and pushed to cover point this time
length delivery on the middle stump line and Wilson gets behind the line to push it back down the pitch
leans forward to push the full-length delivery towards mid-off and calls his partner for a quick single
short in length and outside off stump, shapes to punch it away but is beaten as the ball straightens
similar delivery, this time he gets the back leg across, gets close to the line of the ball and cuts it past backward point.
yorker outside off, squeezed to backward point
gets forward to pinch a single with a drive to mid-off
low full toss on the off stump, Botha stands up tall to thread it between cover point and cover. Nicely timed shot. He didn't go hard;just got the placement right
good delivery. It landed on a length around off stump, drawing the batsman forward before leaving him late.
fuller and Botha gets forward and across quickly this time as compared to the previous delivery and drove it to right of the diving cover fielder
shortens the length and Botha flashes it away, gets a bit of thick edge and it flies down to third man boundary.
moves down the track and drives on the up and through wide mid-off. Franklin runs back from mid-off and makes a sliding stop near the ropes
bangs it short, Wilson backs away and mistimes the pull to square leg

Oram misses the run out. BOtha was well short. It was jabbed to the on side and there was lots of confusion between the two batsmen as they moved across. Oram had all the time in the world but missed the stumps.
tries the Dilshan scoop over the keeper's head, doesn't quite connect well
short of length and outside off, flayed just over Butler at mid-off
on the leg stump line, nudged to the on side
yorker on the middle stump line, dug out to the off side and they rush across for the first run. The cover fielder (McCullum) rushed in and tried to kick it to the stumps and gives away the overthrow
another fine delivery, this one cutting in from outside off and going through the bat and pad gap and over the stumps
full pitched on the off and middle, Wilson drives straight to mid-off
loud shout for the but it looked high. Wilson went for the pull but was struck on the back leg. It was going over the middle stump, thuogh.
fuller, on the middle, pushed towards mid-on for a single
yorker length outside off, nudged to cover point for a single
Catch it Catch it was the cry but it flew over short third man. It was full and outside off, Botha slashed it off the outer edge over the fielder
Botha does now what he wanted to do last ball. One foot out and he scythed the full delivery outside off over extra cover
dabbed to the on side, they think about a single but decide against it. Styris threw at the non-striker's end, misses and they run the overthrow
length delivery on the middle, Wilson tries to back away to force it to the off side but jabs it down the track
moves outside leg and drives on the up but lifts it towards long-off. Franklin runs in and lunges forward to take a fine low catch to terminate this very promising partnership
leans across to push the length delivery through cover point
shout for lbw but perhaps going down the leg side. The offspinner is bowling from round the stumps.

Botha is run out. it was pushed close on the off side, confusion in running, the backward point rushes forward, picks up the ball and dives forward even as he underarms a throw to the keeper who breaks the stumps,
drifting full on the pad, tickled to short fine-leg
over the wicket now for the right-hander. looped across full outside off, pushed through covers for a single
coming in with the arm, edged to the front pad
floated full outside off, square driven to point
slower, length delivery outside off, dabbed towards cover and again, lots of confusion between the two batsmen but they make it across in time
full and outside off, drives inside the line and is beaten
cutting towards middle, defended to cover
The Dilshan scoop is out again. He lunges to the off stide, yanks the head away and laps it over the keeper
switches around to play the reverse sweep but doesn't connect
backs away to the leg side, late cuts it to short third man
swept to backward square leg for a single
caught at deep midwicket. He moved outside off, McCullum slowed up the pace further, looped it outside off and Kevin O'Brien slog swept it straight to the fielder in the deep.
lunges across to drive to right of deep cover
flighted full outside off, heaved down to long-off
flatter, from round the stumps, pushed through point region for a single
flighted full and Cusack planted his front foot out and used his bottom-hand to mow it straight over the bowler and just over the straight boundary as well.
short in length, on the middle and leg, pulled to deep midwicket
bouncing towards middle stump, defended to the off side
short in length and outside off, cut away to wide third man
moves outside leg and drives towards long-off and they rush back for the second run
full again, driven to left of long-off where Redmond is quicker this time to react and prevents the second run
slower one, Cusack adjusts well; he was backing outside leg, arrested his movement, waited for the ball to arrive and played a deft little late cut to third man boundary

Mooney is run out. Poor stuff from him. He shuffles outside off stump, Franklin follows him with a full one, and he edges it to his pad and the ball rolls towards right of cover. Poor running from Mooney, though. He was ambling across and McCullum sensed his opportunity. He picked the ball, swung around to fire in a direct hit at the non-striker's end..
driven through the off side for couple of runs
backs away to cut but finds backward point
full in length on the off stump, dabbed to the sub Diamanti (on for Butler)  at backward point and had he hit the striker's end, Johnston would have been run out.
outside off stump, left alone
fullish, driven to sweeper cover
full and on the middle, swung to deep square leg
ALmost caught at deep midwicket. It was swung high in the air between Broom, at deep midwicket, and Oram, at long-on. Oram left it for Broom who couldn't reach it
pushed away off the front foot for a single
swung to the cowcorner and Broom makes a sliding stop and relays the throw to Oram who throws it to the middle
Johnston likes the midwicket region. He spotted the slower off cutter early and biffed it across to the midwicket boundary
fuller, driven hard down to long-off

Johnson goes for the reverse sweep but edges it high and Diamanti runs back from covers but fails to catch it. A better effort from him could have fetched a wicket.  It wasn't all that far from him in the end
McCullum leads by example on the field. It was swung low to right of midwicket and Brendon lunged out to take the sharp catch
McCallan went for the reverse sweep, missed and was struck in front. It pitched on the leg stump line and skidded in.
leans forward to defend
flighted around off, chipped just short of deep cover
yorker from round the stumps, it lands outside off and West does really well to hang his bat out, open the bat-face and steer it through vacant slip region
cuts away from the off stump, run down to third man
another really full delivery outside off stump, edged to left of third man
Brendon you beauty. What a fielder. It was hit to right of him at extra cover and he rushed across, picked up the ball and fired in a direct hit at the non-striker's end. Gone!
almost yorker length on the off stump line, dug out to cover
another near yorker, squeezed to the on side of the pitch and Oram dives to stop
full in length and outside off, swing and a miss
half-volley outside off, crashed to deep point
low full toss outside off, square driven to deep point region and Nathan McCullum gets across to make a diving stop near the ropes
New Zealand clinch a clinical win. Mills has taken out the off stump with a very full delivery. West went for the cowcorner but no wood on leather. Clatter!
